embeds.title: üé¨ New to Plex? Welcome to Montahulu+!
embeds.description: Thanks for joining! Here's everything you need to know to get started with our Plex server.

fields.name: üì∫ What is Plex?
fields.value: Plex is a streaming platform that lets you watch movies and TV shows from our server on any of your devices. Think of it like your own personal Netflix!

fields.name: üîó Getting Started
fields.value:
**1.** Create a free Plex account at [plex.tv](https://www.plex.tv)
**2.** Send me your Plex email address so I can invite you
**3.** Wait for your invitation email from Montahulu+
**4.** Log in to [plex.tv](https://www.plex.tv) and click **Open Plex**
**5.** Go to **Settings** ‚Üí **Manage Library Access**
**6.** Find the invitation and click the **‚úì** checkmark to accept
**7.** Download the Plex app for your device(s) and sign in

fields.name: üì± Supported Devices
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ Smart TVs (Samsung, LG, Roku, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Streaming devices (Apple TV, Fire TV, Chromecast)
‚Ä¢ Mobile (iOS & Android apps)
‚Ä¢ Web browser at [app.plex.tv](https://app.plex.tv)
‚Ä¢ Game consoles (PlayStation, Xbox)

fields.name: üí° Pro Tips
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ **Quality Settings**: Adjust streaming quality in Settings ‚Üí Quality based on your internet speed
‚Ä¢ **Downloads**: Premium users can download content for offline viewing
‚Ä¢ **Watchlist**: Add shows/movies to your watchlist to track what you want to watch
‚Ä¢ **Continue Watching**: Plex remembers where you left off across all devices

fields.name: üéØ Requesting Content
fields.value: Don't see something you want to watch? Head over to the <#1422424099333869608> channel and let us know! We'll do our best to add it to the library.

fields.name: üìö Full Setup Guide
fields.value:
For detailed instructions on pinning libraries, privacy settings, and more, visit our wiki:
**[Montahulu+ Knowledge Base](https://github.com/sylvieclab/Montahulu-Knowledge-Base/wiki)**

fields.name: ‚ùì Need Help?
fields.value: Check out <#1426287703225270292> for support if you're having issues.

embeds.title: üìå How to Pin Montahulu+ Libraries
embeds.description: Make it easier to find Montahulu+ content by pinning our libraries to your sidebar! This keeps our movies and TV shows front and center.

fields.name: Why Pin Libraries?
fields.value: By default, Plex shows all available content, including Plex's own free streaming libraries. Pinning Montahulu+ libraries puts our shared content right at the top of your home screen.

fields.name: üìç Step-by-Step Guide
fields.value:
**1.** Open Plex and click the **Home** icon
**2.** Click **More** at the bottom of the left sidebar
**3.** Find **Montahulu+** libraries (Movies, TV Shows, etc.)
**4.** Click the **‚ãØ** (three dots) next to each library
**5.** Select **Pin** from the menu
**6.** Repeat for all Montahulu+ libraries you want
**7.** Click **Pinned** at the top to return home

fields.name: üóÇÔ∏è Optional: Unpin Plex's Default Content
fields.value:
For a cleaner sidebar with only Montahulu+ content:
‚Ä¢ Find Plex's default libraries (Movies & TV, Live TV, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Click the **‚ãØ** next to each one and select **Unpin**

*You can always access them from the More menu!*

fields.name: ‚ÜïÔ∏è Reorder Your Libraries
fields.value:
**1.** Click the **‚ãØ** next to any pinned library
**2.** Select **Reorder**
**3.** Drag and drop libraries to arrange them
**4.** Click the **‚úï** to finish

fields.name: üìñ More Resources
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ [Montahulu+ Wiki - Full Setup Guide](https://github.com/sylvieclab/Montahulu-Knowledge-Base/wiki/new-to-plex)
‚Ä¢ [Media Clients Wiki - Visual Guide](https://mediaclients.wiki/en/Plex/Plex-Invite)

embeds.title: üîí Privacy Settings Worth Knowing About
embeds.description: Plex has several privacy features that are enabled by default. Here's how to protect your viewing activity and control what data you share.

fields.name: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Disable Activity Sharing ("Discover Together")
fields.value:
**What it does:** Emails your friends lists of what you watched recently

**How to disable:**
‚Ä¢ Go to [app.plex.tv](https://app.plex.tv)
‚Ä¢ Click your profile photo ‚Üí **View Profile** ‚Üí **Edit Profile**
‚Ä¢ Click **Manage who can see your activity**
‚Ä¢ Set all options to **Private** or **Friends Only**

fields.name: 2Ô∏è‚É£ Disable Watch Status Sync
fields.value:
**What it does:** Syncs your watch progress and ratings across Plex

**How to disable:**
‚Ä¢ Go to [app.plex.tv/desktop/#!/settings/account](https://app.plex.tv/desktop/#!/settings/account)
‚Ä¢ Scroll to **Account Visibility & Activity Sharing** section
‚Ä¢ Find **Sync my watch state and ratings**
‚Ä¢ Click **Update this setting** and disable it

fields.name: 3Ô∏è‚É£ Manage Email Preferences
fields.value:
**What it does:** Controls what emails Plex sends you

**How to manage:**
‚Ä¢ Go to [plex.tv/email-preferences](https://www.plex.tv/email-preferences/)
‚Ä¢ Uncheck any email types you don't want to receive
‚Ä¢ Save your preferences

fields.name: 4Ô∏è‚É£ Disable Playback Data Sharing
fields.value:
**What it does:** Sends your playback data to Plex

**How to disable:**
‚Ä¢ Go to [plex.tv/about/privacy-legal/privacy-preferences](https://www.plex.tv/about/privacy-legal/privacy-preferences/#opd)
‚Ä¢ Find **"Send playback data to Plex"**
‚Ä¢ **Uncheck** the box to opt out

fields.name: 5Ô∏è‚É£ U.S. Users: Opt Out of Ad Partners
fields.value:
**What it does:** Stops sharing data with advertising partners

**How to opt out:**
‚Ä¢ Go to [plex.tv/vendors-us](https://www.plex.tv/vendors-us/)
‚Ä¢ Follow the opt-out process

fields.name: üìö Complete Privacy Guide
fields.value:
For all 6 privacy settings and detailed explanations, visit:
**[Montahulu+ Wiki - Privacy Settings](https://github.com/sylvieclab/Montahulu-Knowledge-Base/wiki/new-to-plex#-privacy-settings-worth-knowing-about)**

Also see: [Media Clients Wiki](https://mediaclients.wiki/en/Plex/Disable-Discover-Together)
